original_text: It was our good friend Epaphras who first told you this good news. Like us, he is Christ's servant. He serves Christ on our behalf.
korean_text: 이와 같이 우리와 함께 종 된 사랑하는 에바브라에게 너희가 배웠나니 그는 너희를 위한 그리스도의 신실한 일꾼이요

sentences.original_text: It was our good friend Epaphras
who first told you this good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 먼저 너희에게 이 좋은 소식을 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: Like us, he is Christ's servant
He serves Christ on our behalf
